website_summaries.verdict: A slide-bounce-house combo that's available at a surprisingly reasonable price. Worth considering despite some concerns about longevity.
pros: Includes a slide and bounce house, both with safety mesh enclosures
Wading pool, built-in sprinkler, and basketball hoop add to the fun
cons: Tears are possible, especially after rambunctious play and winter storage

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long considering the price!
customer_reviews.text: Major blow out after just a few months of use by my 2 children who are 2 and 4 years old. I really hoped for the price it would last us a few summers. How disappointing. Definitely not worth the price tag for such short term life span. My son was literally just climbing in, kicked the front of it as he climbed in and it popped. They are so sad, they loved this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It was pricey considering it didnt last as long as our others but it was so much fun for our 3 year old and 8 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: We use ours outside on the grass and fill it with water so we arent as gentle as those using it inside. We used it for about a year and a half before there was a hole that formed somewhere we couldnt find to patch. It was pricey considering it didnt last as long as our others but it was so much fun for our 3 year old and 8 year old so it was totally worth it! Picture is when it was just inflating, this fills up fast and is very firm for jumping!
customer_reviews.author: Renna

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge success. It was the birthday present for my 4yo, we had a party at our house and planned to have the kids play outside on the swings and on this toy, but clearly it was raining that day. We used this inside, it was loud, but the kids played with it continuously, letting the adults enjoy the party as well. My kids (the second one is 2yo) still play with it almost every day since more than two weeks and haven't managed to destroy it or to hurt themselves. Considering the price to rent this stuff for a few hours, buying it is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Andreussi Oliviero

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Do not buy. I purchased this in 2014 for my then 3 year old, it lasted a New England summer and that was it. We packed it up for the winter and brought it out the following year and after about a month the seams started ripping on the slide which are impossible to repair.
customer_reviews.author: ikimaska

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this bounce house, it is really so much fun. They can bounce and use water slide. Fun, fun, fun for hours on end for my two toddlers. Problem is that it only lasted 2 months and broke. It stopped inflating. I tried different outlets and it still does not work. When I spend $400 I would expect it to last. Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bdazzle

customer_reviews.title: Smalllll
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, I wouldn’t recommend anyone over 3 and more than 3 kids. They keep bumping into each other and there’s very little room to jump. Whoever designed it did not take into account the slide and how close it is to the edge. They keep slamming into it each time.. ankles to chest! I’m returning for a bigger option.
customer_reviews.author: Mkg

customer_reviews.title: Stop the search... THIS IS THE ONE!
customer_reviews.text: BEST... PURCHASE... EVER!!! Bought this 9 months ago for my 3 kids (3, 5, 8). We use it every weekend and needless to say our house is a hit with all the neighbourhood kids! Suitable for all seasons... water during the summer... and fits into a garage in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. We had about 8 kids playing in it at the same time. It definitely holds more weight than what it is rated at. I would recommend this to couples that have kids. The kids were in this thing the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I expected, but it will work for my 4 and 2 year old to splash during the summer. Really easy to set up, and I haven't taken it down yet (we just got it a day ago), so I don't know if it will fit the bag. The material of the inflatable part is very sturdy. I wish the part of the little pool where the slide comes down would be a bit longer, as my kids almost slide right off.. I like that the pump is included. PS.: I would not reccomend it for kids 10 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Ammons

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a huge hit with my two toddlers. They absolutely love it. We use it with water and without water. It is very easy to blow up. It's fairly easy to fold back up, but needs to be done well to fit back into the bag (the more you do it the easier it becomes). Hours of fun and it hasn't gotten old yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa and Zach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1 1/2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered quickly and as expected. The seams seem to hold up well. We have had the product for two months and haven't had any issues. My 1 1/2 year can climb the slide by herself after a couple of times playing. She loves it. She is a little short to climb in the bounce area, but will be able to by summer. We haven't used it wet yet, but are extremely satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: KDavis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this bounce house/pool. It has been perfect for summer. Easy to set up and take down. Product has been durable with many kids playing on it at once.good for children 18M to 8 years max (depending on size of children) my 8 year old can play on this easily.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great outside distraction
customer_reviews.text: We bought this right when the quarantine was starting and my kids have been in it everyday. We are in Florida so this is a great outdoor go to when we need a break from the house. I love the fact that there is the little pool at the bottom, they can go down the slide and go back up without getting out and getting their feet dirty and tracing stuff into the water, like grass and dirt. The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Is ok needs more work in development
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this jumper. Even more the water function is the reason why I purchased the only downfall is that water seeps out through the seams so after using the item I leave it outside for 1 or 2 days to fully dry before I fold it and put it away for the wk. This is the first summer so on the durability part I can't make a comment.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Blew a hole!
customer_reviews.text: Devistated. Was great at first then where u go to enter bounce house at blew a huge hole! Very dangerous children could get hurt! The patches they give are a joke tryed other things. Wont ever buy again. Tons of money for little use!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: WE ARE VERY HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase! It's a great design, high quality and very reasonable price! It was an instant hit with my 3 year old. Everything works exactly as it should and was very easy to setup. It's a blast with water!
customer_reviews.author: James E Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Great seller but not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Well, the wall in the pool area wasn’t closing properly I contacted Amazon for a refund and decent for the seller and they were very professional and issued a refund and a return
customer_reviews.author: minerva

customer_reviews.title: Blower
customer_reviews.text: I love the blower that came with it. water is a little hard to clean out i just found it to fold before it rain. Also its a little smaller the advertised on the picture but overall my kids love it I like it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLAJ3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old to play in during the summer because he loves 2 things - bouncy castles and water. He LOVES this thing. We haven't had any problems with it yet at all. Blower works great, it's standing up perfectly to his use.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bouncy house for two months now. It’s held up well with my two and a half year old and 13 year old. Set up is easy and it fits well in the carrying bag it comes with. The fabric it’s made with is durable and it’s fun for the kids with or without the water. And it saves me a trip to the water park! Love love love this bouncy house. Best purchase I’ve made all year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved it! There were six of them in it at once ranging in age from 4 to 7...plenty of room for them all!! I would suggest that the pool area be a little bigger/longer, especially by the slide, and add another ring to the pool area so the pool is deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We love this. The only thing I would say negative is it needs more space at thr bottom of the slide when the kids slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor anderson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This jump castle is the perfect combination of affordability and durability. The jump castle company we usually use for birthdays has not reopened yet so we found this one. Used for my son and a couple of his friends (ages 3-6) and they had a blast! Easily got my money’s worth in a couple of uses and it sets up in about 2 minutes flat!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Always some dummy with an issue that writes a review. Ignore them. thing is awesome. My kids love it. We use it every weekend. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Andress Crain

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 5 year old's birthday, he LOVES it and so does his little brother. We've had it for about 4 months and it's had lots of use and it's very durable. Blower has worked very well too, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hildur

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Absolutely Love this Bounce House - It has stood up strong ...
customer_reviews.text: My Kids Absolutely Love this Bounce House - It has stood up strong for the beating they put on it all Summer including multiple water times. Glad we stopped renting bigger ones for birthdays cause my kids have way more fun with this one.
customer_reviews.author: B Mounce

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised us with this bouncy house for the girls. They absolutely love it!! It is made very well, its sturdy and holds our 3 girls very well. It is large and I like that it can be turned into a water play land as well.
customer_reviews.author: LaKiki

customer_reviews.title: Kids can’t wait to go outside!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lifesaver during covid-times! The kids are having so much fun every day and getting a lot of exercise. The company itself is very responsive and shipped it out right away. We received it several days before the estimated arrival. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Habibi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works wet or dry! Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect during quarantine time! Very easy to hook up and it inflates in 2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: It was an overall great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have this out every time we have a bbq with friends. We love it. Bought it for my one year old on his bday. It’s a bit too much for him now but in another year it will be perefect. He loves the bounce house and splash pad though. We have had 2 5 yr olds and a 3 year old one it all at once and it did well. Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! My boys ages 3&5 play on here for hours. We haven’t tried it with friends but it would be good with another 1-2 kids I believe. Easy to put up and take down. I would suggest a tarp for underneath. Best quarantine purchase I’ve made so far!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fun but small
customer_reviews.text: Good build kids love it. Was smaller then expected. Total footprint is about is big as a full size truck
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old and she had a blast with it. Not too large, good size. Easy to set up, not so sure yet how it will be to put it away. Used only once so cannot review durability but seems like it will be durable. Also put a tarp underneath it to help make sure no accidental tears. Is a nice fabric like material, not plastic. Our dog even jump in the pool part a few times and held up well. Everyone had fun cooling off!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great if looking for water
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun for my 4 year old. Quality is excellent for the money. Easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: ATLshawty

customer_reviews.title: Not was I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable ripped on the bottom after only a few uses. I was hoping it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dannette Myers

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy! Broke after only using it a few times!
customer_reviews.text: This jump house is terrible!!! Very cheaply made. The kids barely used it and it was never left out in the direct sun, it slit open and pop right along the seam where the kids climb into the jump house. Very disappointed by the quality considering how expensive this was! Warning do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality smaller than picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Really good! used for my 4 year old and 6year old my 14 year old plays with them so it's pretty sturdy!! how ever the size I was disappointed in for the cost I thought it was bigger than it is. The upside it did come with blower
customer_reviews.author: zaida

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is nice for the price and am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think the pool part should be about a foot longer and a few inches deeper. The kids tend to slide over the edge and hurt themselves when they slide down fast. Otherwise it is nice for the price and am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bounce bounce fun
customer_reviews.text: Best ever the kids played all day till the was sleepy well worth it buy buy.. came in two days was happy 4th
customer_reviews.author: Rose bush

customer_reviews.title: These are great for kids to play
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids to play. Easy to set-up and take down. The kids had a lot of fun but if you have larger kids near the 100 pound frame, the bounce house might be a tad small for them. Works great for 3-6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: H. F. Hung

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality - Grandkids love it!! - Easy to set up and quick to take down - comes in a nice storage bag too
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Skogs

customer_reviews.title: Great for big and little kids!
customer_reviews.text: Finding something for both of my kids to enjoy is always a win- my oldest is 7 and my middle is 2. This was easy to set up all by myself, and they have both been playing together for HOURS. This was my first time setting it up this summer but so far I am thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product it arrived late and when it finally got there it was filled with holes. The air was leaking out of everywhere, you could see the water bubbling up from the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Expected a bigger jump; but worth to have
customer_reviews.text: I was little disappointed with the size of the jump I expect to be bigger for what we paid. Other than that My girls really like this jump. I like the fact that can be used with or without water.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but way smaller than I expected especially for almost $400. Maybe could for 5 and under and only 1 or 2 kids in it
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Ann Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Hole in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: We loved this bounce house, however, it got a giant hole in the side that is not repairable with the patches included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves to use this on hot days. Makes quarantine go by faster.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: This was awful!! I had my son do excited that this was coming today & it came dirty & had holes in it so it wouldn't even stay up. Ridiculous. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! My 2 & 4 year old can’t get enough of this thing. Really easy to set up and good quality. Haven’t used to the pool part of it yet though. I’d say a max of about 4 kids under 5 is its limit. Would definitely recommend this for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: A highly recommended purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect item for both my 3 year old and 1 year old daughter. We have spent so many hours playing on this during the summer. A highly recommended purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: U will have to force the kids to come in and eat.
customer_reviews.text: I Love it!!!! Best spent money!! The kids and my husband use it EVERYDAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison C Simmons Cameron

customer_reviews.title: This was fairly easy to put together and take down
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to put together and take down; although, I've only had it up once so far. The grand-kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Our girls love this toy
customer_reviews.text: Our girls love this toy. They have tons of fun on it. The only downside is that if you choose to use it wet, you MUST let it dry ALL the way or it will mold (we learned that the hard way!). Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Leovanna

customer_reviews.title: This particular balloon is very perfect for infants than active kids ages 6 and on
customer_reviews.text: This particular balloon is very perfect for infants than active kids ages 6 and on. Its very small not enough room to have them jumping on. Only one can jump at a time. Had to return it back and buy a bigger water slide.
customer_reviews.author: Grod

customer_reviews.title: I hadn't had this much fun in a long time my 3 year old loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had this much fun in a long time my 3 year old loves it too ;) best money spent totally worth every penny!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela safr- miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it. It was super easy to set up and put away
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to entertain the kids during this quarantine period and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going into our fourth year!
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for 3 summers. It's been really great! After leaving it out in the sun for a long time, it finally ripped. But we were able to patch it and keep playing the rest of the summer! I was amazed it has held up so long, the kids really give it a beating. Hopefully we get another summer out of it. (our Florida "summer" is 8 months out of the year, so it gets heavy use)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Kid's love it. Material is strong and had no problems ...
customer_reviews.text: Kid's love it. Material is strong and had no problems with the seams. I also tested it out with water and it does hold it without any issues. My kids are 7 and 9 and it held their weight no problem. The carrying bag is too small which is why I knocked down a star. I can't zipper it up. Even my smaller bouncer came with a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: BLKDRGN

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR INDIVIDUAL USE OR LIMITED NUMBER OF CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FOR INDIVIDUAL USE OR LIMITED NUMBER OF CHILDREN. WATER SPLASHES OUT WHEN USING SLIDES. PREPARE FOR SOGGY GROUND AREA
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: It folds up nicely and fits in the bag provided
customer_reviews.text: My two children 4 year old, almost 2 year old, and my niece 3 years old had a blast playing in this. I do wish the slide was a little longer, but other than that it's perfect. Just the right size for them.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift from grandparents
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my granddaughter. She absolutely loves it!!!!! Her quote "Granny, this is the best Christmas everrrrr"!!!! Lol that made it mine too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Irving

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful bouncer and provides tons and tons of fun !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Both of my girls love jumping on this and the water is an added ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my girls love jumping on this and the water is an added bonus!! Perfect for hot days and small play dates.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great build!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our backyard for our son and his friends. Our backyard is huge however we didn't want to buy a bouncer that was too big and took up most of the space. This one was just right. Takes up a corner and fits well. The quality is tough and the blower is built well too. Would prefer that the blower is made out of metal and would be more durable in case it falls over, etc... but the one included does the job quite well.
customer_reviews.author: ZakAttack

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter around her 2nd birthday. We've only used it once so far and without the water, but she loved it! IT was super easy to set up and pretty easy to take down, even with me being 8 months pregnant. She is just a TINY bit too short to get up the climber portion on her own but no doubt won't have any trouble in the upcoming months. Can't wait to get all the kids over to play with this when the temperatures start to climb and the humidity is on the rise!
customer_reviews.author: E Macchio

customer_reviews.title: Great size for toddlers and smaller children
customer_reviews.text: Great size for toddlers and smaller children. Was great for our two year old's birthday. Super easy assembly and breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few years now! Easy to inflate with just one person. We always add the water and the kids have a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Westergard

customer_reviews.title: Once the hole was fixed it's a great toy
customer_reviews.text: I'm only disappointed because it arrived with a hole in the lining just beneath the slide that I had to patch before the kids could use it. After I patched it the kids absolutely love it. They are only 2 and when the slide is wet they darn near fly off the "pool" side but it doesn't bother them but the older kids don't have this problem. I just hope that using canoe patching keeps it in working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Boss

customer_reviews.title: Great Return on Investment
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old and 3 year old have hours of fun playing in this bounce house. It is easy to set up, inflates almost instantly and easy to pack away.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday. Arrived after the estimated delivery date, but that has nothing to do with the seller, it's the mail service. once I opened the box, plugged it in and turned it out the bounce house is amazing. Blower is powerful material seems strong. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey308

customer_reviews.title: I bought it and im enjoying every penny of it
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome . I have two daughters ages 2 and 6 that love it. The stitching from the jumping section to the slide is coming loose, and i would like to see the red bumper section for the water to be higher for safety. overall great jumper for kids . Even i go in at 160lbs and bounce around. Just make sure to drain and leave the blower running for 1-2 hrs after use or your jumper will smell like mold
customer_reviews.author: Svc tech

customer_reviews.title: Great Bounce House!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the greatest purchases i have made! The kids love it! Big enough for the early schoolers and small enough for the pre schoolers. They jump they slide and all into a small pool of water coming from the slide shower. They love it and so do I it they have so much fun! I recommend it dry or wet it is fun for the kids. It has also held up quite well. We bought this a few months ago and have used it quite a bit. It's still in top shape. Highly recommended bounce house!
customer_reviews.author: Neil C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and I'm the best dad around!! Money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Nick p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome but no shot this thing fits back into that bag... Still haven't figured it out
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sclafani

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: It met and exceeded my expirations. It's easy to store and provides hours of fun for my kids. They love it
customer_reviews.author: CESAR MARIN

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied much smaller than expected and have pictures of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied much smaller than expected and have pictures of neglectful stitching waiting for it to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: this item fulfilled my every expectation the children were so delighted and have such a wonderful time every time we set this up. this is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: memaw

customer_reviews.title: All fun for the kids and still holding up.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that the kids love. Only complaint is that it is impossible to fit back into it's bag, and there is not bag to store the fan (and ensure that it keeps dry), so I have to keep some parts inside.
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so does my son
customer_reviews.text: Love it and so does my son!!! Wish it was a little bigger but he loves it. Blows up quick and deflates fast. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: kaylwe stoops

customer_reviews.title: Great investment to keep your kids occupied holding up better ...
customer_reviews.text: Great investment to keep your kids occupied holding up better than I would expect still looks really good after two years
customer_reviews.author: AAAA Family

customer_reviews.title: Mom of two
customer_reviews.text: Takes little to set up. I have a three year old and five year old that loves this, but only captures their attention for 30minutes to an hour
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: He simply loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Bounceland Jump & Splash for my 3yr old grandson. He simply loved it!! Its not too huge and fit in their basement nicely. My 2yr old granddaughter loved it as well. They had so much fun together. It is the perfect bounce house for toddlers of that age. We haven't tried the water splash yet but just indoor fun is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great little jumper for the kids. I have high expectations of what I buy and this product met them...my 2 year old son loves playing on it...especially the water slide...I'm actually surprised...overall it's a good toy for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Michael Flores

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a few weeks ago and there are holes all over it now. The different color patches that came with are not adhesive. Does anyone know how I can get these on to stay?
customer_reviews.author: danielle zollo

customer_reviews.title: And you better have a measure tape in hand before you buy ...
customer_reviews.text: It says for ages 3 to 10. My 5 years old can't jump without touching the top of the bouncing house. I will say it's for ages 2 to 3. And you better have a measure tape in hand before you buy it. Because it looks bigger In pictures.
customer_reviews.author: GRETTEL F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slide
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Kids loved it. A great summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased that it held up for a few uses so ...
customer_reviews.text: It needs more room at the bottom of the slide, more padding at the bottom of the slide & / or a bigger rim/edge. We had a lot of issues with the kids flying out of the pool at the bottom & onto the grass. It is also a REALLY hard landing since there isn't much water at the bottom, they just hit the ground immediately at the bottom of the slide. I was pleased that it held up for a few uses so far without any tears, etc. Other than issues outlined above, it has worked as intended.
customer_reviews.author: abee

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: received this product in time for my grandsons birthday.. they love it...
customer_reviews.author: pamela workman

customer_reviews.title: kids loved it - I thought it would be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: kids loved it - I thought it would be a little bit bigger for us to get on it, but def fun size for the kids only - they well enjoyed it and had a great time on it - thanks
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 years old girl and she have a lot of fun in this jump.. she enjoy it at all... its easy to turn on and off.. really recomended and the brand and the company are really trut people... I recomended at all... Five Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Linder

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Expected but perfect for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: THe bounce house area is smaller than i expected as well as the overall bounce house. I think by the time my daughter is 3/4 she might grow out of this one. It is perfect for her and 2 friends now. I don't think more than 2 kids should be in the bounce house area at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Landing needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: The product is good , but the bottom of the slide is too small. My kids are 2 and 3 and they fly out the landing Onto the lawn .
customer_reviews.author: Angela

product_meta.title: Bounceland Jump and Splash Adventure Bounce House or Water Slide All in one, Large Pool, Fun Bouncing Area with Basketball Hoop, Long Slide with Climbing Wall, UL Certified Blower Included
product_meta.description:
Package includes:
11.5'x9'x6h' wet and dry play combo bounce house.
0.7HP,4A Blower with 25 ft power cord and GFCI plug (Recommended for all electronic toys by the American Consumer Safety Committee).
Extra velcro sliding surface for dry play.
Basketball hoop.
Water hose and nozzle.
Ground stakes pack (9" long and spiked for security).
Large carrying bag.
Repair kit and instructions.

Warranty:
We want to make sure you're completely satisfied with our products. All of our bounce houses come with a 90-day limited warranty*, and blowers come with a one-year limited warranty.
*Please note that our warranty is only valid for normal use not for rental or other commercial use.
*Our products are for the U.S and Canadian markets only, they are not suitable for other countries.

Weight limit recommendations:
Recommended for ages 3 to 10.
Maximum weight: 300 lbs.
Maximum kids inside at one time: 3
Maximum individual weight: 100 lbs. 

Customer Service Monday Friday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Central Time Toll Free: 1-866-528-5222.Can be used without water

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Total inflated size is 11.5'x9'x6h' . 9271A Jumping area:54"x51" , Slide length:78" , Pool area:78"x58". Kids can bounce, climb, slide, shoot at the basketball hoop and splash in the pool. Provides hours of backyard fun. Inflated size 11.5' x 9' x 6' H.. Powered by a strong UL blower (included). Heavy duty commercial grade material bouncing floor. Heavy-duty puncture proof materials with double to quadruple stitches. Large pillars all around for a strong bounce structure. 9" long and spiked stakes, to strongly secure the bounce house to the ground. Long (approx. 6 ft) fill tube allows blower to be placed away from the bouncer. Easy set up and take down. Inflates in less than a minute. Indoor and Outdoor Use.
feature_bullets: 【Specifications】1) Product Size: 11.5 ft L x 9 ft W x 6 ft H, 4.5 x 4.25 jumping area, 6.5 foot slide, 6.5 x 4.8 pool area, basketball hoop, and climbing wall. 2) Package includes: bounce house, blower,Basketball hoop,Water hose,Ground stakes pack,Carrying bag,Repair kit and instructions 3) Weight limit: Max weight: 300 lbs, Max individual weight: 100 lbs. Max number of kids: 3 kids 4) Easy set up and take down, inflates in less than a minute. Perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

【Quality Assurance】 1) Heavy-duty puncture proof material with double to quadruple stitches for durability 2) Half way velcro opening for safe and easy access 3) Bouncing surface made with heavy-duty commercial grade material for better bouncing fun and a durable, long-lasting bounce house 4) Strong 9" stakes for ground security 5) Long tube (approx. 6 ft) allows blower to be placed away for more safety 6) Basketball hoop with velcro connection for safety

【Safety Standards】 Bounceland products have been tested and approved for meeting and exceeding current world-wide requirements. We have been certified by ASTM (consumer safety), 16CFR1500.3/16CFR1505 (materials safety), CPSC (manufacturer certified), and UL (blower certified) with 25 ft power cord and GFCI plug (Recommended for all electronic toys by the American Consumer Safety Committee). Note: 120V only for northern American market.

【Satisfaction Guaranteed】 Product satisfaction is our goal. All Bounceland bounce houses come with a 90-day limited warranty covering manufacturing defects. Blowers come with a one-year limited warranty. Experienced customer service always available to help you with your products.
【Perfect Gift] 】 Perfect gift idea for children to stay fit and active. Physical exercise and interaction with friends to replace screen time.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
